lead_paragraph: BACKER--Glenn, Esq.,68, of Rego Park, NY passed away unexpectedly on March 25, 2016. He was deeply loved and his memory will be cherished forever and back. Glenn was the beloved husband of Jineen Zhang and the late Gail Backer, loving father of Amanda Nelson and Paul Backer, stepfather of Didi Chen, father-in-law of Thomas Nelson and Angela Cass, adored grandfather of Parker Nelson, dear brother of Karen Backer, much loved uncle of Lissa Zukoff and Rebecca Challop, brother-in-law of Roger and Louise Challop, cherished son of the late Pearl and William Backer, loved by many cousins and grand-dog Cooper. Services will be held Wednesday, March 30, 12pm, at Riverside Chapel on 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. In lieu of flowers, please consider making a contribution to the Gail Challop Backer Memorial Fund at Sinai Free Synagogue, Mount Vernon, New York or to the Humane Society of New York. 1/3
